大部制.definition: super-ministry system (reform aimed at streamlining government department functions)

大都.definition: for the most part; on the whole; metropolitan

大醇小疵.definition: great despite minor blemishes; a rough diamond

大量.definition: great amount; large quantity; bulk; numerous; generous; magnanimous

大量生產.definition: to manufacture in bulk; mass production

大金背啄木鳥.pinyin: dà jīn bèi zhuó mù niǎo
大金背啄木鳥.definition: (bird species of China) buff-spotted flameback (Chrysocolaptes lucidus)

大錢.definition: large sum of money; old Chinese type of coin of high denomination

大鍋飯.definition: meal cooked in a large pot; communal meal; (fig.) system that rewards everyone equally regardless of merit

大長今.definition: Dae Jang Geum, a 2003 Korean historical drama TV series

大長嘴地鶇.definition: (bird species of China) long-billed thrush (Zoothera monticola)

大門.definition: entrance; door; gate; large and influential family

大關.definition: strategic pass; barrier or mark (i.e. a level considered impressive, usually a round figure such as 10,000); instrument of torture used to break limbs

大關縣.definition: Daguan county in Zhaotong 昭通[Zhao1 tong1], Yunnan

大阪燒.definition: okonomiyaki (Japanese savory pancake) in the Kansai or Osaka 大阪[Da4ban3] style

大阮.definition: daruan or bass lute, like pipa 琵琶 and zhongruan 中阮 but bigger and lower range

大阿姨.definition: auntie, eldest of sisters in mother's family

大限.definition: the limit; maximum; one's allocated lifespan

大限到來.definition: to die; one's allocated lifespan is accomplished

大限臨頭.definition: facing the end (idiom); at the end of one's life; with one foot in the grave

大陸妹.definition: (in Taiwan, Hong Kong or Macao) girl from the mainland; (Tw) Fushan lettuce 福山萵苣|福山莴苣[Fu2 shan1 wo1 ju4]

大陸客.definition: (Tw) tourist from mainland China; illegal immigrant from mainland China

大隊.definition: group; a large body of; production brigade; military group

大雁塔.definition: Giant Wild Goose Pagoda in Xi'an

大雄.definition: great hero; main Buddhist image (in temple)

大雄寶殿.definition: Hall of Great Strength, main hall of a Buddhist temple containing the main image of veneration 大雄[da4 xiong2]

大雅.definition: one of the three main divisions of the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经

大雜院.definition: compound with many families living together

大難不死，必有後福.pinyin: dà nán bù sǐ ， bì yǒu hòu fú
大難不死，必有後福.definition: one is bound for good fortune after surviving a great disaster (proverb)

大難臨頭.definition: to be facing imminent calamity (idiom); disaster is looming

大雨如注.definition: pouring with rain; rain bucketing down

大雪.definition: Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December

大青山.definition: Daqing Mountain in Hohhot 呼和浩特[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4], Inner Mongolia

大面積.definition: large area; (fig.) (of a problem) (occurring) on a massive scale

大韓帝國.definition: Korean Empire, from fall of Joseon dynasty in 1897 to annexation by Japan in 1910

大韓航空.definition: Korean Air, South Korea's main airline

大韻.definition: rhyme group (group of characters that rhyme, in rhyme books)

大頭.definition: big head; mask in the shape of a big head; the larger end of sth; the main part; the lion's share; dupe; sucker; (old) silver coin with a bust of Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯[Yuan2 Shi4 kai3] on the obverse side

大頭照.definition: head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)

大題小作.definition: to cut a long story short; a brief treatment of a complicated subject; fig. to treat an important question as a minor matter

大願地藏菩薩.pinyin: dà yuàn dì zàng pú sà
大願地藏菩薩.definition: Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva, the Bodhisattva of the Great Vow (to save all souls before accepting Bodhi); also translated Earth Treasury, Earth Womb, or Earth Store Bodhisattva

大類.definition: main type; main class; main category

大顯神通.definition: to display one's remarkable skill or prowess; to give full play to one's brilliant abilities

大飽口福.definition: to eat one's fill; to have a good meal

大餘.definition: Dayu county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州[Gan4 zhou1], Jiangxi

大餘縣.definition: Dayu county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州[Gan4 zhou1], Jiangxi

大駕光臨.definition: we are honored by your presence

大驚小怪.definition: to make a fuss about nothing (idiom)

大體.definition: in general; more or less; in rough terms; basically; on the whole; overall situation; the big picture; cadaver for dissection in training medical students

大體老師.definition: cadaver for dissection in training medical students

大鬧.definition: to cause havoc; to run amok

大鬧天宮.definition: Monkey Wreaks Havoc in Heaven, story about the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] from the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记

大魚大肉.definition: dishes with generous amounts of meat and fish; lavish meal

大鱗大馬哈魚.pinyin: dà lín dà mǎ hā yú

大鱗大麻哈魚.pinyin: dà lín dà má hā yú

大鱷.definition: lit. big crocodile; fig. major figure; big shot; top boss (esp. criminal)

大鳳頭燕鷗.definition: (bird species of China) greater crested tern (Thalasseus bergii)

大鳴大放.definition: (idiom) to freely air one's views; to be heard far and wide; to attract a lot of attention

大鳴大放運動.pinyin: dà míng dà fàng yùn dòng
大鳴大放運動.definition: see 百花運動|百花运动[Bai3 hua1 Yun4 dong4]

大鴇.definition: (bird species of China) great bustard (Otis tarda)

大鴻臚.definition: Grand Herald in imperial China, one of the Nine Ministers 九卿[jiu3 qing1]

大鵑鵙.definition: (bird species of China) large cuckooshrike (Coracina macei)

大鵟.definition: (bird species of China) upland buzzard (Buteo hemilasius)

大麥克指數.definition: see 巨無霸漢堡包指數|巨无霸汉堡包指数[Ju4 wu2 ba4 han4 bao3 bao1 Zhi3 shu4]

大麥地.definition: place name in Ningxia with rock carving conjectured to be a stage in the development of Chinese characters

大麻哈魚.definition: see 大馬哈魚|大马哈鱼[da4 ma3 ha3 yu2]

大麻里.definition: Damali or Tamali township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan; same as Taimali 太麻里[Tai4 ma2 li3]

大麻里鄉.definition: Damali or Tamali township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan; same as Taimali 太麻里[Tai4 ma2 li3]

大麻鳽.definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian bittern (Botaurus stellaris)

大黃冠啄木鳥.pinyin: dà huáng guān zhuó mù niǎo
大黃冠啄木鳥.definition: (bird species of China) greater yellownape (Chrysophlegma flavinucha)

大黃魚.definition: Croceine croaker (Pseudosciaena crocea), a fish popular in Cantonese cooking

大齋.definition: to fast; to abstain from food

大齋期.definition: Lent (Christian period of forty days before Easter)

大齡.definition: older (than average in a group, at school, for marriage etc)

大齡青年.definition: young people in their late 20s or older who are still unmarried

大𥻗子.definition: gruel made from coarsely ground maize
